name: topographer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who studies topography (= the physical appearance of the natural features of land): He was a brilliant topographer and military surveyor. The position suggested by some local topographers is probably too far inland. See
topography
More examplesFewer examples He served as a topographer and a captain in the Swedish army.These documents are usually only of much interest to the topographer and historian.He was a pioneer of the methods of the early topographers.
